imdb.plot outline: Trapper Dairen Simpson canoes into the Amazon jungle for a date with destiny. His heart is set on catching Elvira, the young jaguar who beguiled him last time he worked here. She's now wearing a collar loaded with data that will help save her species. Dairen's conservationist employers badly want it back. But while he lays his traps and lures the jaguars in, the jungle develops a personality of its own. It has a killer grudge against Dairen. And will fight to keep its secrets. Will he ever see Elvira again?
imdb.title: The Trapper and the Amazon
akas: The Trapper and the Amazon (South Africa)
